Description: Spacious 4 bedroom apartment in Cambridge. Very close to Central Square and Cambridgeport. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Eat in kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Washer and dryer in unit. Virtual tour is available. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
